channel.title: DeltaScape Dueling
channel.description: So uhmm when people right click another person in a non-wild place the challenge option doesn't come up. It only shows up in the wild. And when they go into the duel arena they can't attack each other for some reason. Any help at all? Gosh damn I can never get help on Mopar....
